dct_title_s: Tourist map of Greece / Published by the Under-Secretariat of State for the Press and Tourism. (Recto)
dct_description_sm: Legend shows railways, roads, roads under construction, and archaeological sites. Recto includes list of "kilometric distances of the principal roads in Greece" with numbers in brackets indicating kilometers between places (such as the distance between Athens and Eleusis). Recto includes ancillary map of Crete. Verso includes tourist information and photographs of the following: Hellas, Athens, Delphi, Olympia, Ancient Corinth, Mycenae, Epidaurus, Temple of Bassae, Mistra, Delos, Thera, Crete, Corfu, Meteora, Salonica, Mount Athos.
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : Under-Secretariat of State for the Press and Tourism, [1938]
